author: Vexed (@vexingvexed)
description: Check system metrics on the host device, such as CPU or  RAM usage
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing!

This cog supports **both embeds and non-embeds**. Embeds are enabled by default, you can disable them with `[p]embedset`. Because of how Red handles this, you will need to do this for each subcommand.
This DOES NOT try to be similar to standard console commands.

This cog has docs! Check them out at <https://go.vexcodes.com/c/system>
name: System
short: Check system metrics on the host device.
